net.krglok.realms.data

Class TableData

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.krglok.realms.data.TableData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PriceTable

    public abstract class TableData
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for storage of YML data in SQLite Database use the SQLibrary for database handling create tables and indices on given definition use automatic rowid of SQlite, so no PRIMARY KEY must be defined make basic datahandling - insert - update - delete - select
    Author:
    Windu
